support_section.title: Support
support_section.intro:
Initial Research is a non-profit organization dedicated to fostering critical dialogue and creative practice. Your support enables us to continue our mission of supporting emerging artists, facilitating meaningful cultural exchanges, and creating spaces for important conversations.

As an independent arts organization, we rely on the generosity of individuals, foundations, and community partners to sustain our programs and initiatives.

how_to_support.title: How to Support
how_to_support.content:
**Make a Donation**

To make a tax-deductible donation, please contact us at [support@initialresearch.org](mailto:support@initialresearch.org) or send a check made payable to "Initial Research" to our mailing address.

**Corporate Partnerships**

We welcome partnerships with organizations that share our commitment to supporting arts and culture. Contact us to discuss collaboration opportunities.

**Volunteer**

Join our community of volunteers who help make our programs possible. We welcome support with events, administration, and outreach.
